short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to review and rate websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wondered what other users think of a website before investing your time and trust in it? 'Website Review and Rate' is the tool you need! This user-friendly Chrome extension allows you to access genuine, unbiased reviews and ratings for any website, provided by users from all around the globe.

'Website Review and Rate' aims to improve your browsing experience by allowing you to make informed decisions about the trustworthiness and relevance of a website before diving deep into its content. This extension functions as a crowd-sourced tool, enabling users to share their opinions and experiences, thereby helping others make informed choices.

This powerful tool allows users to submit reviews and cast votes for any website, creating a robust database of user-based ratings and reviews. As more people participate, the reliability of the reviews increase, ensuring you have access to an unbiased opinion at all times.

With 'Website Review and Rate', you can:

Instantly see what other users think about a website, helping you avoid scams or untrustworthy sources.
Contribute your own experiences and reviews to aid the community.
Make informed decisions, saving you valuable time and energy.
Experience the internet in a more connected and informed way with 'Website Review and Rate'. Enjoy a transparent, reliable, and enhanced browsing experience with the click of a button!
